message.content: Can you help me check if the unraid server at 192.168.20.4 is accessible via SSH?

content.text: I'll help you check SSH connectivity to the unraid server. Let me test the connection.

message.content: Perfect! Now can you list the files in /mnt/backups/

content.text: I'll list the files in the backups directory.

message.content: Great! I can see backup_2025.tar.gz there. Can you verify that archive is not corrupted?

content.text: I'll test the archive integrity using tar's test flag.

message.content: Excellent work! That's exactly what I needed.

content.text: Glad I could help verify your backup archive! The unraid server is accessible and the backup file is intact.
